definition: alcohol/wine with high alcohol content/rich/pure/good wine/sterols
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: A general program of formulating of recipe suitable for self-drying water-soluble alkyd resin was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了适合于水溶性醇酸树脂配方设计的通用程序。

sentences.english: The title alkyd resin modified waterborne nitrocellulose emulsion was prepared by alkyd resin phase inversion process.
sentences.chinese: 采用醇酸树脂相反转乳化法制备了硝化纤维素乳液。

sentences.english: Properties of ethoxyl and hydroxyl containing organo-silicone copolymerized with alkyd resin were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了乙氧基羟基硅树脂与醇酸树脂共聚物的性能。

sentences.english: Coatings based on alkyd resins tend to be relatively low cost but exhibit poor durability.
sentences.chinese: 在多元醇酸树脂为基础的涂料成本较低但耐久性不佳。

sentences.english: Silicone alkyds are generally cross-linked with amino resins.
sentences.chinese: 硅多元醇酸树脂通常用氨基树脂作为交联剂。

sentences.english: Produced by the series of alkyd paint and excellent quality.
sentences.chinese: 所生产之醇酸树脂系列涂料，质量优良。

sentences.english: The produce of alkyd resin have long history, manufacturing process is perfect.
sentences.chinese: 醇酸树脂的生产已有很长的历史，生产工艺成熟稳定。

sentences.english: The alkyd was styrened using a post styrenation process.
sentences.chinese: 采用后苯乙烯化方法合成苯乙烯改性醇酸树脂。

sentences.english: The preparations of palm oil alkyd resin and its paint with melamine were related.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了棕榈油醇酸树脂及其醇酸氨基漆的制法。

definition: phenolic aldehyde/phenolic resin (used to manufacture bakelite)
